summary: Defines a collection of custom Django class‑based view subclasses that are used throughout the generic view test suite. These views extend standard generic views (detail, list, create, update, etc.) to add test‑specific behavior such as custom context data, pagination handling, non‑model object rendering, and raw template responses, enabling comprehensive verification of Django's generic view mechanisms.
business_intent: Supply reusable, test‑oriented view implementations that allow the test suite to exercise and validate the behavior of Django's generic class‑based views under various configurations and edge cases.
